Description: Index describing the change of the first years performance. The starting date for this index is not known.

Value between 1 and 5 comparing how 'good' this score is compared to the national average for this education structure (1 being worse, 2 being somewhat worse, 3 being average, 4 being somewhat better and 5 being better)
String describing to which education structure (group) this school's first years are compared.
